biotools.summary:
Platypus is an open-access software for integrating lymphocyte single-cell immune repertoires with transcriptomes.

R package for the analysis of single-cell immune repertoires. Platypus contains functions that can be used to analyze VDJ and GEX libraries, both individually and separately.

bioschemas.name: Platypus
